title: looking to coach a bronze player who wishes to get better at the game.
body:
title says it all: add me XpitchpleaseX

Im not a god. i ended Silver 1 last season but i know a lot about the game :)

replies.body:
I'd like some coaching, 

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=blackdemonshadow

im a toplane adc main looking for some help, im not that good, but I can get up to bronze 3 but then i demote back down to bronze 5 almost instantly because sometimes i dont know how to carry my heavy teams.

Any help would be appreciated.

I'd be keen. Played a few seasons ago and went from Bronze 1 after 4 wins in my promos.

This pre-season won 5 out of 10 in promos and ended up in Bronze 5.

I know I have a lot to learn, but ending up in the lowest possible rank and having to so frequently play in games where I can end up like this;

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/159535475/201021950?tab=overview

Or worse like this;

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/158123352/201021950?tab=overview

Honestly, how did I end up in Bronze 5 when I can play a game with the most kills, least deaths, most assists, most damage to the enemy champs, most gold, most wards etc. as a {{champion:432}} support

Yeah usually provisionals place you really shitty the second + time you do them. 
Got your add request.
If you only ended at s1 you're probably not good enough to coach people since you probably make a lot of mistakes yourself, no offense intended.

I was S2 in Season 5, but am now stuck in B5. I am a Jungle/Mid main, and have really good success rates with {{champion:28}} , {{champion:61}} , {{champion:121}} , and {{champion:39}} . In fact, I am consistently getting master/challenger level CS & gold on {{champion:28}} , but can never seem to carry my teams.

How much do you charge?
I can help you out finished Plat as a jungler let me know

I just played league of legends for like 2 or 3 months now. and i got silver 1 in my provitionals.
Can you still help me please? C:
add me - oterladyfl

Of course! 
I just added you :)
